oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Philanthropic Motives and Models
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brief summaries including: 'Aristarchus Champion, Philanthropist of the Western Reserve Builder of the Chagrin Falls Library (Town Hall)' by Yolita E. Rausche; 'Albert Fairchild Holden' by Molly M. Offutt; 'Joseph G. Butler and the Founding of the Butler Art Institute' by Rebecca Rogers
